metadata.Title: CVE-2021-36978 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
QPDF 9.x through 9.1.1 and 10.x through 10.0.4 has a heap-based buffer overflow in Pl_ASCII85Decoder::write (called from Pl_AES_PDF::flush and Pl_AES_PDF::finish) when a certain downstream write fails.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-36978` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libqpdf26 - 9.1.1-1ubuntu0.1
qpdf - 9.1.1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: qpdf package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '9.1.1-1ubuntu0.1').
